name: Alexa Sales Assistant Sample
description: A Heroku and Heroku Connect based skill to interact with Salesforce over Alexa

SFDC_INSTANCE_URL.description: Instance URL for your Salesforce data. This should look like https://na50.salesforce.com or https://brave-moose-406615-dev-ed.my.salesforce.com. If you don't have it at this time, you can put in temporary values now and fill it in later via your Settings -> Config Variables.

DEBUG_ENABLED.description: Enables extra debug logging in the skill.
